content: उत्फुल्ल {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [उद्-फल्-क्त] {@--1@} Opened, full blown (as flowers); उत्फुल्लनीलनलिनोदरतुल्यभासः <ls>Śi. 11. 36.</ls> {@--2@} Widely opened, expanded, dilated (eyes); विस्मय °नयनः <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Swollen, increased in bulk. {@--4@} Sleeping supinely or on the back; <ab>cf.</ab> उत्तान. --ल्लं {@--1@} The female organ of generation (स्त्रीकरणं). {@--2@} A kind of coitus.
